Generation VIII.Sword: It spends its entire life inside an apple. It hides from its natural enemies, bird Pokémon, by pretending it's just an apple and nothing more.
Generation VIII.Shield: As soon as it's born, it burrows into an apple. Not only does the apple serve as its food source, but the flavor of the fruit determines its evolution.

Generation IX.Scarlet: It grows by eating the flesh of an apple. Applin uses its own body fluid to strengthen the apple’s skin and prevent it from rotting.
Generation IX.Violet: Applin lives inside an apple. When an Applin is separated from its apple, its body loses moisture and the Pokémon grows weak.
